name: Harvest Shoots
description:
It's Honest Work

Farming is an old way of life, and one that has experienced many innovations. Up on those fertile verdant sky islands, you're bound to learn a new trick or two. Plant your crop and reap the rewards, lest your efforts be eaten away...

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Switch tools - 1 and 2
  • Interact - E
  • Use tool - Left click
Credits:
  • Level design and majority of props by Breadotop.
  • Gun prop by Hennejoe/Joe.
  • Music by Rafael Krux.
